alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 28 at 8:20AM MST until October 30 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 25-30 degrees over the higher elevations and near-freezing temperatures of 30-35 degrees across some of the lower elevations. * WHERE...Portions of Yavapai and northern Gila counties. This includes Seligman, Prescott, Chino Valley, Crown King, Cordes Junction, Cottonwood, Camp Verde, Strawberry, Young, and Payson. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Freezing temperatures will kill gardens, crops, and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northern Gila County; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
